body_html:
@branquinhoaa Thank you so much for the PR! It works great!
Two minor issues I noticed:

  1. The conference exporter. Somehow it exports the header line with the , separator and all other lines with the ; separator now.
  2. I'd add more space between two offers (see below). But this is just a really minor thing.
body_text:
@branquinhoaa Thank you so much for the PR! It works great!
Two minor issues I noticed:

The conference exporter. Somehow it exports the header line with the , separator and all other lines with the ; separator now.
I'd add more space between two offers (see below). But this is just a really minor thing.
body:
@branquinhoaa Thank you so much for the PR! It works great!
Two minor issues I noticed:
1) The conference exporter. Somehow it exports the header line with the `,` separator and all other lines with the `;` separator now.
2) I'd add more space between two offers (see below). But this is just a really minor thing.
![01e8779783](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1745735/29539420-1124494c-86ca-11e7-99cb-ad262068ed4d.png)
